quiz.question: bathetic ______
quiz.explanation: 平淡的，平淡的结局。The grand epic had a disappointing bathetic ending that left audiences unsatisfied. 宏大的史诗有一个令人失望的平淡的结局，让观众不满意。

quiz.question: pathetic _____
quiz.explanation: 可怜的，可怜的景象。The abandoned dog was a pathetic sight shivering in the rain. 被遗弃的狗在雨中颤抖是一个可怜的景象。

quiz.question: aesthetic _____
quiz.explanation: 美学的，美学的品味。The interior designer had impeccable aesthetic taste. 室内设计师有无可挑剔的美学的品味。

quiz.question: _____ anesthetic
quiz.explanation: 麻醉剂，局部麻醉剂。The dentist administered a local anesthetic before the procedure. 牙医在手术前施用了局部麻醉剂。

quiz.question: hermetic ____
quiz.explanation: 密封的，密封的封条。The jar had a hermetic seal to preserve freshness. 罐子有密封的封条以保持新鲜。

quiz.question: genetic ______
quiz.explanation: 遗传的，遗传的标记。Scientists identified a genetic marker for the disease. 科学家发现了该疾病的遗传的标记。

quiz.question: frenetic ____
quiz.explanation: 狂热的，狂热的节奏。The city moved at a frenetic pace. 这座城市以狂热的节奏运转。

quiz.question: kinetic ______
quiz.explanation: 动能的，动能。The moving car possessed kinetic energy. 行驶的汽车具有动能。

quiz.question: phonetic ______
quiz.explanation: 语音的，语音的符号。Linguists use phonetic symbol to represent sounds. 语言学家使用语音的符号来表示声音。

quiz.question: _________ heretic
quiz.explanation: 异教徒，宗教异教徒。The religious heretic was excommunicated from the church. 宗教异教徒被逐出教会。

quiz.question: peripatetic _______
quiz.explanation: 巡回的，巡回的教师。The peripatetic teacher traveled between schools. 巡回的教师在学校之间奔波。

quiz.question: impolitic ______
quiz.explanation: 不明智的，不明智的评论。His impolitic remark offended many voters. 他不明智的评论冒犯了许多选民。

quiz.question: sybaritic _________
quiz.explanation: 奢华享乐的，奢华享乐的生活方式。The millionaire lived a sybaritic lifestyle. 百万富翁过着奢华享乐的生活方式。

quiz.question: ____ critic
quiz.explanation: 评论家，电影评论家。The film critic gave the movie a poor review. 电影评论家给这部电影差评。

quiz.question: authentic ________
quiz.explanation: 真实的，真实的文件。The historian verified the authentic document. 历史学家核实了真实的文件。

quiz.question: narcotic ____
quiz.explanation: 麻醉的，麻醉药物。The patient was prescribed a narcotic drug for pain. 患者被开了麻醉药物止痛。

quiz.question: demotic ______
quiz.explanation: 通俗的，通俗的文字。Ancient Egyptians used demotic script for everyday writing. 古埃及人使用通俗的文字进行日常书写。

quiz.question: hypnotic ______
quiz.explanation: 催眠的，催眠的节奏。The music had a hypnotic rhythm that mesmerized listeners. 音乐有催眠的节奏让听众着迷。

quiz.question: despotic _____
quiz.explanation: 专制的，专制的统治者。The despotic ruler suppressed all dissent. 专制的统治者镇压了所有异议。

quiz.question: exotic ______
quiz.explanation: 异国的，异国的花朵。The garden featured rare exotic flower from the tropics. 花园里有来自热带的稀有异国的花朵。

quiz.question: quixotic ______
quiz.explanation: 不切实际的，不切实际的计划。His quixotic scheme to save the world was admirable but impractical. 他拯救世界的不切实际的计划令人钦佩但不实际。

quiz.question: peptic _____
quiz.explanation: 消化性的，消化性溃疡。Stress can contribute to peptic ulcer formation. 压力会导致消化性溃疡形成。

quiz.question: dyspeptic _________
quiz.explanation: 消化不良的，消化不良的抱怨。The patient visited the doctor with a dyspeptic complaint. 患者带着消化不良的抱怨去看医生。

quiz.question: septic ____
quiz.explanation: 化粪池的，化粪池。The rural property had a septic tank for waste disposal. 农村房产有一个化粪池用于废物处理。

quiz.question: aseptic _________
quiz.explanation: 无菌的，无菌的技术。Surgeons use aseptic technique to prevent infection. 外科医生使用无菌的技术预防感染。

quiz.question: antiseptic ____
quiz.explanation: 消毒的，消毒的湿巾。The nurse cleaned the wound with an antiseptic wipe. 护士用消毒的湿巾清洁伤口。

quiz.question: synoptic _____
quiz.explanation: 概要的，概要的图表。Meteorologists study the synoptic chart for weather patterns. 气象学家研究天气模式的概要的图表。

quiz.question: apocalyptic ______
quiz.explanation: 启示录的，启示录的景象。The prophet described an apocalyptic vision of the end times. 先知描述了末日的启示录的景象。

quiz.question: cryptic _______
quiz.explanation: 神秘的，神秘的信息。The spy left a cryptic message that needed decoding. 间谍留下了需要解码的神秘的信息。

quiz.question: bombastic ______
quiz.explanation: 夸大的，夸大的演讲。The politician's bombastic speech was full of empty promises. 政客夸大的演讲充满了空洞的承诺。

quiz.question: sarcastic ______
quiz.explanation: 讽刺的，讽刺的评论。His sarcastic remark hurt her feelings. 他讽刺的评论伤害了她的感情。

quiz.question: iconoclastic _______
quiz.explanation: 打破传统的，打破传统的思想家。The iconoclastic thinker challenged conventional wisdom. 打破传统的思想家挑战传统智慧。

quiz.question: pleonastic ______
quiz.explanation: 冗余的，冗余的短语。'Free gift' is a pleonastic phrase. '免费礼物'是一个冗余的短语。

quiz.question: periphrastic _____
quiz.explanation: 迂回的，迂回的风格。The writer's periphrastic style was difficult to follow. 作家迂回的风格难以理解。

quiz.question: majestic _________
quiz.explanation: 雄伟的，雄伟的山脉。The majestic mountains towered over the valley. 雄伟的山脉矗立在山谷之上。

quiz.question: sadistic ______
quiz.explanation: 虐待狂的，虐待狂的倾向。The villain had a cruel sadistic streak. 恶棍有残忍的虐待狂的倾向。

quiz.question: eulogistic ______
quiz.explanation: 颂扬的，颂扬的演讲。The funeral featured a eulogistic speech about the deceased. 葬礼上有关于逝者的颂扬的演讲。

quiz.question: moralistic ____
quiz.explanation: 说教的，说教的语气。The article had an annoying moralistic tone. 这篇文章有令人讨厌的说教的语气。

quiz.question: chauvinistic ____
quiz.explanation: 沙文主义的，沙文主义的观点。His chauvinistic view offended many colleagues. 他沙文主义的观点冒犯了许多同事。

quiz.question: anachronistic ___
quiz.explanation: 过时的，过时的法律。The anachronistic law needed to be updated. 过时的法律需要更新。

quiz.question: characteristic _______
quiz.explanation: 特征性的，特征性的特点。Blue eyes are a characteristic feature of the breed. 蓝眼睛是该品种特征性的特点。

quiz.question: linguistic _______
quiz.explanation: 语言的，语言的特征。Tone is an important linguistic feature in Chinese. 声调是中文中重要的语言的特征。

quiz.question: altruistic ___
quiz.explanation: 无私的，无私的行为。Donating to charity is an altruistic act. 向慈善机构捐款是无私的行为。

quiz.question: agnostic ______
quiz.explanation: 不可知论的，不可知论的立场。He maintained an agnostic stance on religious matters. 他在宗教问题上保持不可知论的立场。

quiz.question: caustic _______
quiz.explanation: 刻薄的，刻薄的评论。Her caustic remarks wounded his pride. 她刻薄的评论伤害了他的自尊。

quiz.question: acoustic ______
quiz.explanation: 原声的，原声吉他。The musician played an acoustic guitar at the concert. 音乐家在音乐会上演奏了原声吉他。

quiz.question: rustic _____
quiz.explanation: 乡村的，乡村的魅力。The cottage had rustic charm with its wooden beams. 小屋有木梁的乡村的魅力。

quiz.question: mystic ______
quiz.explanation: 神秘的，神秘的幻象。The holy man experienced a mystic vision. 圣人经历了神秘的幻象。

quiz.question: attic ____
quiz.explanation: 阁楼，阁楼房间。Old furniture was stored in the attic room. 旧家具存放在阁楼房间里。

quiz.question: therapeutic ______
quiz.explanation: 治疗的，治疗的效果。The massage had a therapeutic effect on sore muscles. 按摩对酸痛的肌肉有治疗的效果。

quiz.question: _____ havoc
quiz.explanation: 浩劫，造成浩劫。The storm would cause havoc in the coastal town. 风暴会在沿海城镇造成浩劫。

quiz.question: scad __ _______
quiz.explanation: 大量，大量选择。The restaurant offered a scad of options on the menu. 餐厅菜单上提供了大量选择。

quiz.question: _____ figurehead
quiz.explanation: 傀儡，皇家傀儡。The king was merely a royal figurehead with no real power. 国王只是没有实权的皇家傀儡。

quiz.question: proofread _ _____
quiz.explanation: 校对，校对草稿。The editor would proofread a draft before publication. 编辑会在出版前校对草稿。

quiz.question: _______ fad
quiz.explanation: 时尚，时尚潮流。The fashion fad came and went quickly. 时尚潮流来去匆匆。

quiz.question: _ myriad __ _____
quiz.explanation: 无数的，无数的星星。The night sky showed a myriad of stars. 夜空中呈现无数的星星。

quiz.question: ironclad ____
quiz.explanation: 铁定的，铁定的规则。The school had an ironclad rule against cheating. 学校有反对作弊的铁定的规则。

quiz.question: ____ ballad
quiz.explanation: 民谣，民间民谣。The musician sang a traditional folk ballad. 音乐家唱了一首传统的民间民谣。

quiz.question: nomad _____
quiz.explanation: 游牧民，游牧民部落。The nomad tribe traveled across the desert. 游牧民部落穿越沙漠。

quiz.question: ____ inroads
quiz.explanation: 进展，取得进展。The company began to make inroads into the Asian market. 公司开始在亚洲市场取得进展。

quiz.question: crabbed ___________
quiz.explanation: 难辨认的，难辨认的笔迹。The old letter had crabbed handwriting. 旧信上有难辨认的笔迹。

quiz.question: self-absorbed ________
quiz.explanation: 自我陶醉的，自我陶醉的青少年。The self-absorbed teenager rarely thought of others. 自我陶醉的青少年很少考虑别人。

quiz.question: barefaced ___
quiz.explanation: 厚颜无耻的，厚颜无耻的谎言。He told a barefaced lie without any shame. 他厚颜无耻地说了厚颜无耻的谎言。

quiz.question: jaundiced ____
quiz.explanation: 有偏见的，有偏见的观点。His past experiences gave him a jaundiced view of politicians. 他过去的经历让他对政客有有偏见的观点。

quiz.question: __ unnoticed
quiz.explanation: 未被注意的，未被注意。His good deeds often would go unnoticed. 他的善行经常未被注意。

quiz.question: pronounced ______
quiz.explanation: 明显的，明显的效果。The medicine had a pronounced effect on her symptoms. 药物对她的症状有明显的效果。

quiz.question: hardheaded _______
quiz.explanation: 务实的，务实的现实主义者。He was a hardheaded realist who dealt with facts. 他是一个处理事实的务实的现实主义者。

quiz.question: levelheaded ________
quiz.explanation: 冷静的，冷静的方法。She took a levelheaded approach to the crisis. 她对危机采取了冷静的方法。

quiz.question: jaded ______
quiz.explanation: 厌倦的，厌倦的味觉。The food critic had a jaded palate from tasting too many dishes. 美食评论家因品尝太多菜肴而有厌倦的味觉。

quiz.question: lopsided _____
quiz.explanation: 一边倒的，一边倒的比分。The game ended with a lopsided score of 50 to 10. 比赛以50比10的一边倒的比分结束。

quiz.question: backhanded __________
quiz.explanation: 挖苦的，挖苦的恭维。His backhanded compliment was actually an insult. 他挖苦的恭维实际上是侮辱。

quiz.question: evenhanded _________
quiz.explanation: 公正的，公正的对待。The judge provided evenhanded treatment to all parties. 法官对所有当事人提供公正的对待。

quiz.question: underhanded _______
quiz.explanation: 卑鄙的，卑鄙的手段。The competitor used underhanded tactics to win. 竞争对手使用卑鄙的手段获胜。

quiz.question: closed-minded ________
quiz.explanation: 固执己见的，固执己见的态度。His closed-minded attitude prevented him from learning. 他固执己见的态度阻止了他学习。

quiz.question: long-winded ______
quiz.explanation: 冗长的，冗长的演讲。The politician's long-winded speech bored the audience. 政客冗长的演讲让观众感到无聊。

quiz.question: unfounded _____
quiz.explanation: 没有根据的，没有根据的谣言。The unfounded rumor spread quickly through the town. 没有根据的谣言在镇上迅速传播。

quiz.question: ____ grounded
quiz.explanation: 有根据的，有充分根据的。Her theory was well grounded in scientific evidence. 她的理论有充分根据在科学证据上。

quiz.question: outmoded ________
quiz.explanation: 过时的，过时的做法。The company abandoned its outmoded practice. 公司放弃了过时的做法。

quiz.question: unguarded ______
quiz.explanation: 不谨慎的，不谨慎的评论。His unguarded remark caused controversy. 他不谨慎的评论引起了争议。

quiz.question: ________ deed
quiz.explanation: 契约，财产契约。The lawyer reviewed the property deed. 律师审查了财产契约。

quiz.question: reed ___
quiz.explanation: 芦苇，芦苇床。Birds nested in the reed bed by the river. 鸟儿在河边的芦苇床筑巢。

quiz.question: ____ screed
quiz.explanation: 冗长的文章，冗长的文章。The critic wrote a long screed attacking the film. 评论家写了一篇攻击这部电影的冗长的文章。

quiz.question: engaged ______
quiz.explanation: 订婚的，订婚的情侣。The engaged couple planned their wedding. 订婚的情侣计划他们的婚礼。

quiz.question: full-fledged ______
quiz.explanation: 完全成熟的，完全成熟的成员。She became a full-fledged member of the organization. 她成为该组织的完全成熟的成员。

quiz.question: jagged ____
quiz.explanation: 锯齿状的，锯齿状的边缘。The broken glass had a dangerous jagged edge. 破碎的玻璃有危险的锯齿状的边缘。

quiz.question: ragged _______
quiz.explanation: 破烂的，破烂的衣服。The homeless man wore ragged clothes. 无家可归的人穿着破烂的衣服。

quiz.question: dogged _____________
quiz.explanation: 顽强的，顽强的决心。Her dogged determination helped her succeed. 她顽强的决心帮助她成功。

quiz.question: deranged ______
quiz.explanation: 精神错乱的，精神错乱的杀手。The police searched for the deranged killer. 警方搜寻精神错乱的杀手。

quiz.question: estranged ______
quiz.explanation: 疏远的，疏远的夫妇。The estranged couple filed for divorce. 疏远的夫妇申请离婚。

quiz.question: detached _____
quiz.explanation: 独立的，独立的房子。They bought a detached house with a garden. 他们买了一座带花园的独立的房子。

quiz.question: drenched _______
quiz.explanation: 湿透的，湿透的衣服。Her drenched clothes needed to be changed. 她湿透的衣服需要更换。

quiz.question: wretched ____
quiz.explanation: 悲惨的，悲惨的生活。The poor family lived a wretched life. 贫困的家庭过着悲惨的生活。

quiz.question: shed _____
quiz.explanation: 流下，流下眼泪。She would shed tears at the sad movie. 她会在悲伤的电影中流下眼泪。

quiz.question: accomplished ________
quiz.explanation: 有造诣的，有造诣的音乐家。The accomplished musician performed at Carnegie Hall. 有造诣的音乐家在卡内基音乐厅演出。

quiz.question: distinguished ______
quiz.explanation: 杰出的，杰出的职业生涯。He retired after a distinguished career in medicine. 他在杰出的职业生涯后退休了。

quiz.question: ______ watershed
quiz.explanation: 分水岭，政策分水岭。The new law marked a policy watershed. 新法律标志着政策分水岭。

quiz.question: full-bodied ____
quiz.explanation: 醇厚的，醇厚的葡萄酒。The sommelier recommended a full-bodied wine. 侍酒师推荐了醇厚的葡萄酒。

quiz.question: disembodied _____
quiz.explanation: 无形的，无形的声音。A mysterious disembodied voice echoed in the hall. 神秘的无形的声音在大厅里回荡。

quiz.question: studied ___________
quiz.explanation: 故意装出的，故意装出的漠不关心。His studied nonchalance didn't fool anyone. 他故意装出的漠不关心没有骗过任何人。

quiz.question: unqualified _______
quiz.explanation: 完全的，完全的成功。The performance was an unqualified success. 演出是完全的成功。
